name: VR GirlFriend
description: Under the VR mode, "Nancy's Summer" adopts eyes focusing to operate the game, of which the atmosphere is divided into two modules. In the Viewing Mode, game players can choose to take pictures for the shower or dance scenes; and in the Play Mode, you are able to gain game currency that can be consumed in the game through...
minimum_requirements: OS: WIN7(Recommended)/WIN8/Vista Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GTX750ti DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space
